entry.title: Slowing down the onslaught by @SudySarathy Web3 security is clearly a dire need of the hour. Unlike with web2 attacks, here the funds siphoned are dir...
entry.summary: Slowing down the onslaught by @SudySarathy Web3 security is clearly a dire need of the hour. Unlike with web2 attacks, here the funds siphoned are directly a % of total value locked and hence can be quite massive. ◤ https://tickingcompass.substack.com/p/how-to-slow-down-this-rekt-storm
